author: shootingstar393
title: DO NOT STAY HERE!!
text: The rooms are so unbelievably small! You don't have any room to move around. I was there in November an when I turned on the heat the pipes started to make an awful noise. When I went down to the desk to complain they said that they could change my room but unfortunately CANNOT guarantee it won't be in another room. I think this is absolutely ridiculous. I will never stay here again and I advise you do the same. Much better hotels in the area. This is not worth it. PLUS there is a facility fee not included in your reservation. It's an extra 30 per night that the hotel charges you.
